snippet.title: Berry People Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Add this game to your wishlist on Steam: https://s.team/a/2295700

The forest is full of little berries that have come to life! Explore the forest and discover its secrets! Take pictures with your camera to fill out your photo album with all the berries your can find!

🏛️  Explore over 25 different areas 
🍅  More then 100 berries to photograph
🐌  A few minigames here and there
🌲  At least 783 trees, maybe more

Berry People is a game where you take photos of as many berries as you can find! You can find these silly creatures hiding everywhere in the forest. Explore each area fully to discover all of its secrets! Take a breath of fresh air while relaxing in a field of flowers, climb a very tall hill or take your time and try to count all of the falling -- Wait is that a berry? Quickly! Take a picture!

This game is pretty short, because we like them that way. Released as part of the Sokpop Takeover. Thank you so much for your support, Sokpop! (http://www.twitter.com/sokpopco)

Made by me and Jasper Oprel (https://www.twitter.com/oprel)
Music by Dorkus64 (https://www.twitter.com/dorkus64)
